description: This template deploys SharePoint 2013, 2016 or 2019 with 3 VMs (DC, SQL and SharePoint). Domain Controller runs ADCS and ADFS. SharePoint has 1 web application with 2 zones. Default zone uses Windows authentication and Intranet zone uses federated authentication with ADFS.
summary: This template deploys SharePoint 2013, 2016 or 2019 optimized for running integration tests.
